title: Crypto Library
author: Crypto Library

content: I Have USDT on Kucoin but suddenly I need BTC in my this wallet---> bc1qf7w26caegj0kjxuf802dhnk0tn0sz5wlcaysre remind this process only for reducing amount of tx fee.So if anyone agrees kindly PM me your Kucoin UID after sending BTC(0.0008) and also put the TX-ID on the replyI will pay in usdt on kucoin internal transaction as the market price goes on.My telegram @cryptolibraryofficial for fast communication QuoteUID:TX-ID:It's

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: In case, if you don't get a deal here, try https://pnnv.com/exchangeThe total cost will be around $4-$5, I think that's cheaper than using Kucoin. I have used this service a few times, and have used 2 times this morning too. They are very convenient. So dar, I can also say they are trusted too.

I have used this service a few times, and have used 2 times this morning too. They are very convenient. So dar, I can also say they are trusted too.Well thank you mate for the suggestion now I am going to just exploring that. But the thing is, I'm very stingy,  and it's better to spend a little money on what I'm going to use it for.That's why I would like to see any person who has Bitcoin on their wallet(like trust wallet) then it could be easier because their the transaction fees are going to also low. So cost will be low  . I don't know if there any others way to The transaction fee can be more reduced welcome those

comments.author: Z_MBFM
comments.body: Quote from: Crypto Library on September 14, 2023, 09:08:34 AMI Have USDT on Kucoin but suddenly I need BTC in my this wallet---> bc1qf7w26caegj0kjxuf802dhnk0tn0sz5wlcaysre remind this process only for reducing amount of tx fee.So if anyone agrees kindly PM me your Kucoin UID after sending BTC(0.0008) and also put the TX-ID on the replyI will pay in usdt on kucoin internal transaction as the market price goes on.My telegram @cryptolibraryofficial for fast communication I send you 0.0008 BTC This is the transaction ID https://blockchair.com/bitcoin/transaction/bf642d8f310ea7951bdab696b785d65513fe49dc30b3caad1898e788ab1b90bd?from=trustwalletI have sent you my Kucoin UID by pm, please check Bitcointalk message.

And thanks for the upfront tx  .
